name: CIS Amazon EKS Benchmark
description: Center for Internet Security (CIS) Benchmarks for Amazon EKS

controls.title: Restrict Access to the EKS Control Plane Endpoint
controls.description: Ensure that the EKS cluster control plane endpoint is not publicly accessible

controls.title: Enable EKS Control Plane Audit Logging
controls.description: Ensure that EKS control plane audit logging is enabled

controls.title: Enable Envelope Encryption for Kubernetes Secrets
controls.description: Ensure that envelope encryption is enabled for Kubernetes secrets

controls.title: Use IAM Roles for Service Accounts
controls.description: Ensure that IAM roles are used for service accounts

controls.title: Implement Network Policies
controls.description: Ensure that network policies are implemented
